question: I know its not allowed to marry a Uncle (ie: Father's Sister's husband) but if this relationship has crossed their limits by doing zina.
answer:
QUESTION
I know its not allowed to marry a Uncle (ie: Father's Sister's husband) but if this relationship has crossed their limits by doing zina. So now the only way we find is marriage & by doing this we belive we can ask repentance to Allah as well as we can face the society, So is it possible for us to get married after all this happenings. Please guide me in this complicated situation.
ANSWER


Share:
The father?s sister?s husband is not a Mahram (prohibited in marriage). It is permissible to marry him.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
